author: Anonymous Gear
title: marking scheme %s
question:
Just wanted some clarification on the below statement:
You must pass the combined average of midterm 2 and the final exam to pass the course.
Does this mean you need to achieve a 22.5/45% (m2=20%, final=25%) to pass then?
student_answer: I believe the average of your midterm 2 and final grades should be at least 50%. So, if you get 40% on midterm 2, then you should get at least 60% on the final.
